content.heading: Introduction
content.text: Welcome to Lumina AI. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you when you use our web application. As this is a demo application, our data practices are minimal and focused on providing the core functionality.

content.heading: Information We Collect
content.text: The only personal information we collect and store is a username of your choosing and an optional profile picture. All of this data, along with your generation history and saved favorites, is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. This means the data resides on your own device and is not transmitted to or stored on our servers.

content.heading: How We Use Your Information
content.text: The information stored in your local storage is used solely to personalize your experience within the app. The username and profile picture are displayed in the UI, and your history and favorites are saved for your convenience, allowing you to access them in future sessions from the same browser.

content.heading: Data Sharing and Disclosure
content.text: We do not have access to, nor do we share, the data stored in your browser's local storage with any third parties. Since the data never leaves your device, it cannot be disclosed by us.

content.heading: Data Security
content.text: The security of your data is dependent on the security of the device and browser you are using. We do not implement additional security measures as we do not handle or store your data on our servers.

dataDeletionPage.title: Data Deletion Policy
dataDeletionPage.p1: Lumina AI is a demo application that stores all user data, including your username, profile picture, generation history, and saved favorites, directly in your web browser's local storage.
dataDeletionPage.p2: This means that no personal data is ever sent to or stored on our servers. The data remains on your own device.
dataDeletionPage.p3: To delete all of your data, you can simply clear your browser's cache and site data for this website. This will permanently remove all information associated with your use of the app. If you need assistance, please contact us at
dataDeletionPage.p4: Clearing your site data is an irreversible action and will reset your account, credits, and all saved work.
